HousingInstability: BMC shared that the family was referred to the Department of Housing and Community Development (2201 Washington Street) for housing needs and are no longer in the hospital. SW called Dad with a Haitian Creole Interpreter (ID# 257323). Dad shared that the family was driven by a social worker to a hotel, where they are staying until SW comes back for them to take them to the identified home. Dad reports he did not have a name or phone number for that social worker and is awaiting for her to come back for the family. Dad believes it will take her a few days to find somewhere and come back for them.
